description:
The Keroro Platoon has the horrifying realization that it`s Kululu`s turn to come up with an invasion.  They have to stop him, at all costs!  And then Keroro comes up with the idea to ply Fuyuki with feel-good stories until he is moved to return the Kero Ball to them.  The stories don`t quite have the effect they anticipated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, the Invasion Has Started / Keroro, a Good Kero Story!
クルル 侵略は始じまっている / ケロロ ケロいい話!
